title: Undercover Submissive
description: Twin Sisters, hidden secrets, and dark passions..When the police refuse to do anything to find her missing sister, Cayce Miller resolves to find her without their help, but her investigations soon reveal she knew less about her sister than she thought she did.Discovering that her sister was involved in a lifestyle she didn't know existed, Cayce soon learns that the only way to find her sister, and save her from the danger she is in, is to take her identity and enter her sister's life.Taking her sister's place leads to a charged and dangerous game, played in a steamy world where passion goes hand in hand with surrender.Will going undercover destroy Cayce or will it reveal a side to her she never knew existed?Only time will tell in this tense erotic thriller ....Enjoy other great titles from Michelle by visiting her Amazon Author Page.
author: Michelle Hughes
